events.name: Rouen Startup Weekend mars 2012
events.about:
Welcome On The Site Of Rouen From Startup Weekend!

You will find here all information related to the event to be held on 23, 24 and 25 March in the premises of Rouen Business School.

We are waiting for you: register before March 1 to get 20 € discount.

What Is A Startup Weekend?

Startup Weekend is an event of 54 hours where developers, marketers, financiers meet to share ideas, build teams, develop products and launch startups.

On a weekend of field experimentation, entrepreneurs and aspiring entrepreneurs can test and see if their idea is viable. On average, half the participants have a technical background and the other half profile business

Startups weekend taking place worldwide on a proven format, and now clearly identified in the world of startups and entrepreneurs of the Internet.

Progress

The late Friday afternoon, the project leaders present their ideas to inspire other participants, for them to join their team.

Saturday to Sunday, the teams refine their projects by working on the target customer, testing their ideas and creating prototypes. In the late afternoon, each team presents its project to a panel of experts that will give them an accurate and complete return on their project. The jury chooses a project that will contest winner.

During these two days, teams will attend three short lectures to help them refine their project.

Friday evening and Sunday, two cocktails networking will be offered to teams, mentors and institutional help to meet and exchange. Saturday and Sunday, a buffet dinner with free access is available to provide the highest availability for teams and mentors

Objectives

The Startup Weekend hosts the local ICT community by bringing together two days of contractors confirmed, bearing ideas, and accompanying institutional entrepreneurship and innovation.

It is also an opportunity to be meet with technical profiles and business profiles. This complementary expertise is critical to the success of any project.

The startup weekend helps develop projects that may be accompanied by incubators and support structures for entrepreneurship.

Participants

The Startup Weekend is open to everyone, but especially targets:

Project leaders well in advance of start-ups with the aim to help them start their project quickly.
Students, both in trade in engineering school with the aim to make them work.
One hundred participants are expected.

Mentors are present on two days to support the project teams. These mentors are entrepreneurs, developers, experts and institutions that will question, advise teams to advance their project.

As mentors, we will include Olivier Ezratty, author of Guide to Startups HigtTech in France, but also members of the association NWX # who have started businesses and technical skills.

Organization

Date: Friday, March 23 from 18h until 19h Sunday, March 25

Location: premises of Rouen Business School in Mont Saint Aignan (10 rooms + 1 amphi)

The project is supported by associations Spark Entrepreneurship (RBS Student Association supports the promotion of entrepreneurship) and # NWX (Normandy Web Xperts: association of Internet professionals in Normandy)

Partners

The partners of the operation are BNP, IRSEEM (OpenInnovation), RBS, and SEINARI THE CREA.

JURY

The jury will consist of Business Owners and representatives of local incubators:

Ilan Benhaïm - co-founder of Private Sale
Denis Gallot - RBS incubator
Fabien Lieval - incubator Seinari
A business angel
A business leader in the Internet Domain
